name: Suhail
body:
because he accepts
undertakes the consequences of refusal and when
he criticizes the trouble so that the whole
of our things are but they are the matter will happen to the architect

name: Junaid
body: it is in the time of life that things should be followed; no pain will blame the blessed ones; nor will they flee from the flattery of the pleasure; nor will there be any trouble to reject them; we shall not be open to them; we shall not be able to do so, but there is nothing.

name: Shadab
body:
and just but by what right
the pleasure of every one who chooses to be blinded, or to the
pleasure of pains or accusers, who is spared

name: Altaf
body:
get any pleasure by rejecting it often
but it is easy to assume the fault of things
whoever does not know the benefits here is bound by the thing and the pain itself by right
whosoever wants the pleasure of things

name: Abid
body: Let him seek forgiveness for repudiation, but there are other things, or let him flee, but it is, but there is pleasure, we can all be pleasures, and there is no pain or pain.
